Even if this doujinshi is just fiction, it means something that thecharacter have some belieable reactions otherwise it is a joke not a sad story. The problem with this netorare (and many of them) is not that your main character are betrayed by his most important people (girlfriend, mother, dauther or wife), the problem is his lack of reaction. I know tha what i called problem it is something that represent netorare but i think it would be more enjoyable and with better stories if the main character react as someone normally do (with anger in most cases, violence or in some greater situation with a master plan for revenge, and i dont say that it has to be a hapy end or that he win in the end but at least that he tried). To sum up, manabu is a jerk who cant kill or injure or do something to someone who enter to his house without protection.but is
D i'd like many pf these tragic stories but a sad ending without trying is a bad story with a bad plot that a lazy writer do,but its fapeable

I told myself a lie after reading this that the girl isn't his child but Kenta's. Then i reread the previous release that it might be a possibility since  Kenta was training his mom before Manabu was and Miho could possibly be Kenta's child. So Manabu is just overreacting for nothing. Plus he should stop being a little bitch. Pitying him was a mistake. But i'm not saying he deserves it, just don't pity him.
